EmailTemplate.description: Sent to submitter when an Outcomes Achievement and Payment Claim is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Outcomes Achievement Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Outcomes Achievement and Payment Claim Form submitted for Grant {!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.lcf_grant__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.OwnerFullName},
You have successfully submitted an outcomes achievement and payment claim form, reference {!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.lcf_grant__c}:{!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.Name}.
Your funding office will be in touch to review the form with you..
If you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@biglotteryfund.org.uk with the above reference.
Kind Regards, Centre for Social Impact Bonds
